table.caption: Table 141 – Arguments and results of the group compositing function
head: Variable
Meaning
rows: The transparency group: a compound object consisting of all elements E1, … , En of the group—the n constituent objects’ colours, shapes, opacities, and blend modes
Computed colour of the group, which is used as the source colour when the group is treated as an object
Computed shape of the group, which is used as the object shape when the group is treated as an object
Computed alpha of the group, which is used as the object alpha when the group is treated as an object
